text: Denys Pavlyuk (; born 15 January 1992) is a Ukrainian modern pentathlete. He is 2018 European bronze medalist in men's team competitionСучасне п’ятиборство: збірна України виборола "бронзу" чемпіонату Європи. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male modern pentathletes Category:World Modern Pentathlon Championships medalists
title: Denys Pavlyuk
